sentences.sContent: ...transparencies of masterpieces from Lizzie's art collection.
sentences.sCn: …莉齐艺术收藏品中一些杰作的幻灯片。

synos.tran: [化学]透明，[核]透明度；幻灯片；有图案的玻璃

words.tran: 透明的；显然的；坦率的；易懂的
显然地，易觉察地；明亮地

trans.tranCn: 透明，透明度；幻灯片；有图案的玻璃
trans.tranOther: a sheet of plastic or a piece of photographic film through which light can be shone to show a picture on a large screen
